value:
How tasteless... That, in your hand.
Is that the weapon that undid me?

I draw strength from death. Pain and
despair sing to me. All the world will
join the chorus of the dead...

Eir's countless lives have dwindled
all the way down to the very last one.
My power thrums with their number.

I am death. Your reason and meaning
are nothing to me.

All who oppose me will feel the fear
of death etched into their marrow as
they join the cohort of the dead...
The hour of your death draws nearer.

I will deliver suffering and
death to this world.

No time to think in the face
of death. It is meaningless...
You are cursed.

The time of the dead
is upon us...

I am Hel. I rule the realm of the dead.
You cannot fight death, so you would
do well to accept your fate...

No matter what you might accomplish
in life, all living beings have the cold
realm of the dead waiting for them.$k$pNobody can run from death. As soon
as life is granted, the hourglass's
sands begin to fall away...$k$pSomeday, death will swallow even
you, and the memory of your deeds,
your whole existence, will fade away.$k$pKnowing that...you continue.
You persist. Without hesitation,
you struggle against destiny.$k$pI will stay to watch you struggle...
Until that moment your body goes
limp and cold, I will watch, waiting.
ふ…
Death!
ああっ！
抗うのか…
Accept your death.
Death comes for all.
Death is absolute.
I am death itself.
Can I die?
ふふ…
I am Hel, and I rule over death. Every death, and the realm of the dead.
Hmm? Are you asking something of me?
Above all else, I would see all of the living join the ranks of the dead.
All will die. None can deny the truth of that.
There is an imbalance between the living and the dead. We must bring equilibrium.
Hmmm. I can see what remains of your life.
Do you hope to grasp death, to control it? You?
Ah. Yes.
A good day to die.
Death comes.
